snippet: AOL’s chief, Tim Armstrong, set off a firestorm among American workers by publicly revealing information about medical costs for two babies covered by company health plans.
abstract: AOL’s chief executive Tim Armstrong sets off firestorm among American workers by publicly revealing information about medical costs for two babies covered by company health plans; patient and work force experts say gaffe could have lasting impact on how comfortable--or discomfited--Americans feel about bosses' data-mining their personal lives.
lead_paragraph: AOL’s chief, Tim Armstrong, set off a firestorm among American workers by publicly revealing information about medical costs for two babies covered by company health plans.

headline.main: Revelations by AOL Boss Raise Fears Over Privacy
headline.print_headline: Revelations by AOL Boss Raise Fears Over Privacy
